ingredients.content: 13 oz parsnips, peeled and cut into pieces
8 ½ oz dessert apples, peeled, cored, quartered

preparations.content: Place parsnips and apples into mixing bowl and chop <b>4 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add water and milk and cook <b>15 min/212°F/speed 2<b>. Purée <b>30 sec/speed 8<b> increasing speed gradually. Scrape down sides and lid of mixing bowl with spatula and purée a further <b>30 sec/speed 8<b> increasing speed gradually. Allow to cool before serving or freeze in individual portions.
